summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Windows 11 simulation app including authentication, role-based access control, desktop functionality, admin features, and user workflows. Both backend APIs and frontend UI tested successfully.

design_issues.issue: React hydration warnings in console for table structure
design_issues.details: HTML structure warnings that don't affect functionality

passed_tests: Backend API health check
Admin login (SuperAdmin/AdminSuper)
User login (formateur1/01012000)
Invalid login rejection with proper error message
User management APIs (create, read, update, delete)
Login logs tracking and display
Broadcast system functionality
SuperAdmin deletion protection
Lock screen display and interaction
Desktop loading for both admin and user roles
Taskbar with centered layout and user indicator
Start menu with role-based app filtering
Admin Panel access and user management interface
Admin-only features (Admin Panel, CMD Terminal) hidden from users
File Explorer with read-only mode for regular users
Fake Browser navigation and content display
CMD Terminal with basic commands (help, dir, whoami, time, date)
Window management (open, close, minimize, maximize)
Logout functionality returning to lock screen
Role-based desktop icon filtering
Proper French localization throughout the interface
